attributes.action: Make sustainable period products except from pink tax.
attributes.additional_details: These were previously excemt from the 2021 abolishment of the tampon tax. More people who menstruate are using sustainable products since society is becoming more environmentally aware. These people should not be penalised for choosing the sustainable option. Hence, no tax should be applied to sustainable menstrual products.
attributes.background: Abolish the tax that is currently applied to sustainable menstrual products.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635692
